## alignmentQuat variable

Returns quaternion describing the rotation from direction vector `from` -<!-- -->&gt; `to`<!-- -->. If `normalize` is true (default), first normalizes the vectors (not modifying original).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
alignmentQuat: (from: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, to: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, normalize?: boolean) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
